name: Lost Satellite
description:
Controls

⌨️ [WASD] - Move   [R] - Restart level   [Space] - Grab

🎮 (L) - Move   (A) - Restart level   (Y) - Grab

How to play
  • Reach the beacon.
  • Keep eye on your fuel tank.
  • In the red zones the satellite cannot be controlled.
  • In order to open the doors use the grappling hook and transfer energy units to the blue zones.
  • The game has 9 levels.
Credist

Yalki (Code, Game Design)

Gilnners (Art)

Sound assets from www.kenney.nl
